article.title: New Hampshire U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the New Hampshire U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Name & Title

Industry & County Coverage

Email & Phone

Justin Oslowski

USEAC Director
  • Architecture, Construction & Engineering
  • Defense & Aerospace
  • Environmental & Energy Technologies
  • Safety & Security

Belknap, Carroll, Coos, Grafton, Merrimack, Rockingham, Strafford

Justin.Oslowski@trade.gov

603.953.0210

Taylor Little

InternationalTrade Specialist
  • Giftware & Consumer/Home Goods
  • Healthcare Technologies/Medical Devices
  • Information & Communications Technology
  • Services

Cheshire, Hillsborough, Sullivan

Taylor.Little@trade.gov

603.953.0211

*Please Note: if you do not see your industry sector listed, pleasedefer to county coverage.

Trade Information Center

1.800.USA.TRADE (1.800.872.8723)

The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with the New Hampshire office. For additional export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am–6:00 pm Eastern Time.


Visit our new page for export updates!

  • ​Updates for Exporters​

​
